name: Lion Fund
overview:
Lion Fund is an ‘institutional founder’ of B2B software companies and next generation businesses. We explore lots of traditional, slow moving, unsexy industries and build companies from scratch with our own in house team and seed capital. We act as the primary founder driving companies forward through our metric intense, experimental driven approach.

Once portfolio companies achieve proof of concept, we leverage our network of domain experts, strategic partners and angel investors to spin out independent companies and help scale them to the next level.

We study hundreds of ideas and markets per year and launch 3-4 independent companies per year with an extreme focus on mobile.
